name: clara-xlsx-diff
description: XLSX comparison tool using Clara Rules and EAV triples

scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:clara-rules
scripts.test:cljs: npx shadow-cljs compile test && node dist/test.js
scripts.test:clara-rules: lein cljsbuild once test && node target/test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:clj && npm run test:clara-rules && npm run test:cljs
scripts.deploy: cp types.d.ts /mnt/c/project/xlsx-compare-extension/lib/clara-xlsx-diff/ && cp example-usage.ts /mnt/c/project/xlsx-compare-extension/lib/clara-xlsx-diff/ && cp utils.ts /mnt/c/project/xlsx-compare-extension/lib/clara-xlsx-diff/ && cp target/main.js /mnt/c/project/xlsx-compare-extension/lib/clara-xlsx-diff/ && cp -r target/cljsbuild-compiler-1 /mnt/c/project/xlsx-compare-extension/lib/clara-xlsx-diff/

author: Your Name
